files.content: "use client" import { FrameIcon, LifeBuoyIcon, MapIcon, PieChartIcon, SendIcon, } from "lucide-react" import { Sidebar, SidebarContent, SidebarGroup, SidebarGroupContent, SidebarGroupLabel, SidebarMenu, SidebarMenuButton, SidebarMenuItem, SidebarProvider, } from "@/registry/new-york-v4/ui/sidebar" const projects = [ { name: "Design Engineering", url: "#", icon: FrameIcon, }, { name: "Sales & Marketing", url: "#", icon: PieChartIcon, }, { name: "Travel", url: "#", icon: MapIcon, }, { name: "Support", url: "#", icon: LifeBuoyIcon, }, { name: "Feedback", url: "#", icon: SendIcon, }, ] export default function AppSidebar() { return ( Projects {projects.map((project) => ( {project.name} ))} ) }
